head.title: Weddings; Debra J. Hirsch, Jerald M. Boyle

hedline.hl1: Weddings; Debra J. Hirsch, Jerald M. Boyle

block.p: Debra Jane Hirsch and Jerald Michael Boyle, executives at Saatchi & Saatchi Advertising in New York, were married yesterday evening in Bernardsville, N.J. Rabbi Rachel Cowan officiated at the Bernards Inn.
The bride, 30, is an account supervisor. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania. She is a daughter of Marilyn and Donald Hirsch of Holmdell, N.J.

Debra Jane Hirsch and Jerald Michael Boyle, executives at Saatchi & Saatchi Advertising in New York, were married yesterday evening in Bernardsville, N.J. Rabbi Rachel Cowan officiated at the Bernards Inn.
The bride, 30, is an account supervisor. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania. She is a daughter of Marilyn and Donald Hirsch of Holmdell, N.J.
Mr. Boyle, 32, is a senior producer. He graduated from Hofstra University. He is a son of Louise Joy Boyle of Massapequa, L.I., and the late John Boyle.
